name: hubzilla
description: Hubzilla is a decentralized social networking platform that supports forums, file sharing, webpages and chat. It uses the Zot protocol for identity nomadicity and privacy, and can federate with other social platforms.
features: Decentralized Platform: Run your own social network node that federates with other Hubzilla instances.
Nomadic Identity: Move your identity between servers without losing connections or content.
Multiple Features: Combine social networking, forums, file sharing, and webpages in one platform.
Zot Protocol: Advanced federation protocol with strong privacy and identity features.
Access Control: Granular permissions for posts, files, and pages with flexible privacy settings.
Cloud Storage: Built-in file storage with WebDAV support for easy file management.
CMS Capabilities: Create and publish web pages and wikis alongside social content.
ActivityPub Support: Federate with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other ActivityPub networks.
